name: Discovering Colors - Animals
description: Discovering Colors is a coloring game featuring fun animals! It's aimed at young children, and is recommended for ages 2 to 5.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A Coloring Book Game for Children
